name: Nervous Dice
description:
To play this game, click any open space in the grid. 

A die will be rolled, and your score will be the total of all dice in the grid. However, if there are any dice vertically or horizontally adjacent to the die you just placed, they will re-roll.

----

This game was made solo, for the GTMK game jam 2022. I made the game in Godot, and I made the dice and pencil assets in blender.

This is my first game-jam, and I have limited game-dev experience. I'm really happy with my game, simple as it is. Seeing a small project through to completion has been a great experience.

I hope you enjoy this little puzzle. See if you can get a score above 90!
